title: Kirk Minihane, ft. KFC
description:
Barstool Sports' KFC joins the Kirk Minihane Show to talk about sports talk radio, Dave Portnoy, the corporate transformation of Barstool, his parking ticket problem, his feud with Minifan Show host MHB, and more. In the end, there can be no doubting KFC is a thoroughbred Minifan.Â 


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/kminshow
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
